document_data.name: Musharib
document_data.mainbody: '''Musharib''' ({{Pronounce|moo|shah|REEB|refs=}}) was a [[Chultan dwarf]] working as a guide out of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Musharib worked as a guide, but was really seeking adventurers to aid him in reclaiming his ancestral forge of [[Hrakhamar]] from a group of [[firenewt]]s. He also sought to retrieve the [[dwarven]] relic ''[[Moradin's Gauntlet]]'' from the armory of Hrakhamar.
document_data.Personality: If Musharib encountered any dwarven adventurers, he would appeal to their dwarf pride to help him in his quest.
